actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Cathedral Caverns National Monument in the State of Alabama.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment by the Secretary of the Interior of the Cathedral Caverns National Monument in the State of Alabama. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry the provisions of this Act, but not to exceed $700,000 for the acquisition of property specified in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Cathedral Caverns National Monument in the State of Alabama.
